```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(rio)
library(here)

# import and tidy column names
states_data <- import(here("data/states_all.csv"), setclass = "tibble") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()

```

```{r part1_ash}

```

```{r part2_cam}
# prepare data
states_data %>%
  mutate(rev_enr = total_revenue / enroll,
         math_score = (avg_math_4_score + avg_math_8_score) / 2,
         reading_score = (avg_reading_4_score + avg_reading_8_score) / 2) %>%
  select(state, rev_enr, math_score, reading_score) %>%
  group_by(state) %>%
  summarize(avg_revenue = mean(rev_enr, na.rm = TRUE),
            avg_math = mean(math_score, na.rm = TRUE),
            avg_reading = mean(reading_score, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  filter(!is.na(avg_revenue),
         !is.na(avg_math),
         !is.na(avg_reading)) %>%
  mutate(state = stringr::str_to_title(state))



```
